Comment.value: ACTION: Show Saer Bodkin's store. Aside from selling returned reagents back to the player, this also acts as Edwin's special store of higher-powered magic items.

NOTE: Kermit is a potted plant placeable object near the bookcase (MDK2 cameo). His OnUse script determines whether or not you have the wardstone. If you do, it acts as a container, letting you access what it holds. If you don't have the wardstone, he bites you for 1 point of damage with an accompanying text message describing the action.

LinkComment.value: CONDITION: Tome of Imaskar is in the area. Normal Int
CONDITION: The Tome of Imaskar is in the area. The player is an Arcane spellcaster. Normal Int
CONDITION: Normal Int
CONDITION: The Tome of Imaskar is in the area. The player is an Arcane spellcaster. Low Int
CONDITION: Player has Tome of Imaskar. The player is an Arcane spellcaster.  Low Int
CONDITION: Low Int

Comment.value: ACTION: Show Saer Bodkin's store. Aside from selling returned reagents back to the player, this also acts as Edwin's special store of higher-powered magic items.

CONDITION: The Tome of Imaskaran is NOT in the bookshelf.

NOTE: If the player tries to leave the area with the Tome, it is stripped from him and returned to the bookshelf. If the player drops the book, it is magically returned to the bookshelf.
